title: Language Education Design Integrating Islamic Values

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Case-based learning environment integrating Islamic values into language education for professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields, utilizing BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) and project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can write case analysis reports connecting language education content (e.g., Arabic sentence structure) to Islamic values (e.g., Tawhid)
Learners can produce project outcomes reinterpreting sociology topics (e.g., multicultural understanding) from an Islamic perspective (e.g., al-Adl al-Islami)
Learners can explain methods for creatively utilizing Quranic and Hadith passages in language learning material development

resources: Database of Case Studies Linked to Islamic Values

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
